# elu(alpha:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an Exponential Linear Unit (ELU) activation operation to the current graph.

## Declaration

```swift
func elu(alpha: Float) -> BNNSGraph.Builder.Tensor<T>
```

## Parameters

- **alpha**: The `alpha` value.
title: elu(alpha:)
